Description:
Stylish, Period Appeal!
Seize the opportunity to secure this exquisite Victorian home which has been immaculately kept, maintained and updated beautifully. Beyond this charming facade of the timber frame porch, which features cast iron latticework, red & blue stained glass windows and entry door, lies a bright and inviting home offering 3 large bedrooms, the master bedroom completed with built-in-robes and pressed metal feature on the walls, central bathroom which includes a shower over bath and vanity, the laundry and toilet are separately located. Featuring a spacious kitchen and meals area that is complimented with a showpiece ceiling and elaborate cornice, the home also offers a separate living that is also of decent size. This enchanting period home is full of original character, some of these original features include stunning leadlight glass work, red & blue stained glass windows and doors, ceiling rosettes, large & elaborate skirting, architraves and cornices and let’s not forget the beautiful ornate fireplaces with timber surrounds. Baltic pine polished floorboards, soaring ceilings throughout and 2 split systems that provide year-round comfort making this a smart investment or fantastic home to live in and enjoy! Complete this dream home with a large picket and hedge for complete privacy and minimal noise exposure.
Positioned on a good-size allotment with off-street parking and minimal maintenance yard, this one is not to be missed!
Close to all shops, schools and public transport including the train station only 1km away!

Description:
Spacious contemporary family home on fantastic block
Situated just two minutes drive from all the amenities on offer at Lansell Square, and positioned high on a quiet street surrounded by attractive new builds, is this stunning modern family home.
Set back on a spacious block of over 2200 square metres, this beautifully presented property offers a modern façade and great curb appeal with a landscaped front garden, wide circular gravel drive and extensive slate paving leading to the front entry.
The home, a Paul Connell build, opens into an entry hall, which leads to left into the first of four bedrooms the property provides. With a built-in robe and ceiling fan, the position of this room allows it to make a fantastic study or home office. Next is the spacious master bedroom with ceiling fan, generously-proportioned walk-through robe and a large ensuite with double shower, double vanity and toilet.
To the right of the entry is a large formal lounge with a gas log fire, complementing the evaporative ducted heating and cooling found throughout the property.
Heading down the hallway is access to the kid’s retreat, featuring a ceiling fan, sliding doors, and windows with built-in plantation shutters allowing for privacy and the easy ability to check in on the kids if needed.
Beyond this space is a great sized open plan kitchen, living and dining room.
The modern kitchen features a huge island bench, five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven, dishwasher and spacious walk-in pantry. Ample storage and contemporary fittings add to the appeal, alongside additional conveniences such as a ducted vacuum system.
Behind the kitchen is a huge laundry with built-in cupboards and a large walk-in linen closet, along with a door providing access to the side of the house. Next to the laundry is secure access to the double garage.
Off the dining room is a hallway leading to two bedrooms – both with ceiling fans and built-in robes. A powder room, triple linen cupboard and family bathroom complete the family-friendly design.
From the dining room are two glass sliding doors providing access to the al fresco area and the outdoor space beyond. The entertaining space is under the roofline and features a ceiling fan, TV point, power and a fantastic brick fireplace.
The fully fenced area of the rear garden is the perfect play zone for young children and beyond the entertaining space is an additional sun deck.
Through a gate and down steps to the rear of the block is a fantastic space offering plenty of potential. Towards the end of the long driveway is a triple garage with two roller doors and a tank behind the shed.
The driveway is wide enough for a truck to easily enjoy access to the rear of the property and there is plenty of room at the end of the block to easily turn. At the very rear of the property is tranquil private bush land.
This fantastic family home has plenty to offer and is ideal for a buyer wanting a modern home in spacious surrounds that is close to schools, shops and more.

Description:
EXTREMELY WELL MAINTAINED FAMILY HOME
This well cared for beautifully presented home is sure to impress the most discerning buyer. Features include a large formal lounge with gas heating, spacious kitchen with ample cupboard/bench space and adjoining dining area. The three double bedrooms have BIR's and the main has an ensuite. There are also two R/C units. Set on a large corner block, the home is securely fenced, has a covered outdoor living area, double carport, single garage with good sized workshop. Ideally located close to all amenities this property would suit a variety of buyers including investors, young families and down sizers.

Description:
A Perfect Renovation with Scope to Subdivide (STCA)
So much potential is on offer with this 1950's four bedroom home. Set on a large 1026m2 block the location itself offers a short walk to Kangaroo Flat shopping precinct. Extra-large split level lounge/ living area has a gas space heater, a gas wall furnace and air conditioning unit. Generous master bedroom with freestanding robe, ceiling fan and external door. Second bedroom also has external door. Kitchen/meals includes gas hotplates, electric wall oven and dishwasher. Two good sized workshops both with power. An additional large vaulted ceiling Bungalow contains gas space heater and ceiling fan. Extras include solar panels, security alarm and the home is surrounded by automatic external shutters.
Wide side access to rear garden meets a massive carport which would easily house 5 vehicles. Bus at front and train station close bye. Close proximity to great schools, Lansell Square Shopping complex and walking tracks.
Melbourne side of Bendigo.

Description:
RELAXING AND DESIRABLE LIVING IN KANGAROO FLAT
This desirable three bedroom home is in a sought after Kangaroo Flat location which has everything going for it. Backing on to a nature reserve complete with your own access, gives a sense of privacy. This home offers a large master bedroom with WIR and ensuite, the remaining bedrooms are complete with BIR's. A spacious formal lounge, spotless kitchen with dishwasher, electric cooking, plus an open plan dining/living area complete this fantastic home. Ducted heating and split system cooling keep you comfortable all year round. The double garage has direct internal access and a rear roller door for access to the backyard. Outside, you will find a 6x6m workshop with concrete floor and power along with a small garden shed. A great, covered outdoor entertaining area, complete with water feature add a sense of relaxation. Close to all that Kangaroo Flat has to offer, including nearby schools, plus the bus route ensure this property will appeal to the buyers wanting just that little extra.

Description:
Great Unit in a Picturesque and Private Complex
Tucked away peacefully and privately at the rear of a delightful well-manicured spacious complex. If you enjoy the bird life and the back drop of stunning trees, then this is for you. The unit offers a good sized lounge with adjoining functional kitchen. The three-piece bathroom is conveniently located adjacent to the two bedrooms both with BIR’S. Gas heating and split system. Compact secure rear yard with space for a small garden. Single garage. Currently let for $265 p.w. to a great tenant. Ideal for investment or owner occupier. Bus stop at the front of complex. Just a few minutes’ drive to Kangaroo Flat shopping centre or approx. 10-minute drive to the CBD or catch the bus it stops just out the front.

Description:
Enchanting home with Beautiful Gardens
Beyond the white picket fence and beautiful established gardens is this lovely 1960's built home that is, I'm sure you'll agree, a bit special. Very well maintained over the years the home is mostly original but has had the bathroom renovated at some point. Perfectly livable as is, neat and tidy everywhere you look, but also allowing for further renovation if you're so inclined. Features include: 3 bedrooms, two with built in robes; Gas heating and reverse cycle cooling; ceiling fans in the lounge, kitchen and main bedroom; a beautiful paved outdoor area amongst the abundant greenery of the fernery with fountains; a 5m x 4m workshop and a single car carport. Conveniently located only minutes from the new leisure centre, Kangaroo Flat shops, public transport including the Kangaroo Flat train station, schools, parks, walking tracks and medical facilities. Take the time to see this see this enchanting home before it's too late. Call now to arrange your inspection.

Description:
IDEAL FOR FIRST HOME BUYERS OR INVESTORS!
Everything is already done for you here. The home has been completely refurbished inside and out. Some of the improvements include new kitchen, updated bathroom, new carpets and floor coverings, freshly painted inside and out, new split system & a new instantaneous hot water service. The home has also been re-stumped, had new plumbing and the fuse box has been upgraded. It's also in a great position being handy to pre-schools, primary & secondary schools, shops such as IGA, Aldi, Coles, Woolworths plus Bunnings and numerous other retail shops, the new Aquatic Centre (opening in 2018) & walking tracks along Bendigo Creek.
Sitting behind a picket fence, the home comprises three bedrooms with ceiling fans, new kitchen with plenty of cupboards & bench space, dishwasher, side by side gas oven & cooktop, large fridge space with views over the rear yard. Adjacent is the very comfortable carpeted lounge with gas space heater, split system and ceiling fan. The bathroom has been updated and has shower over bath, new vanity and heat lamps for those chilly mornings. A separate toilet is located near the laundry which has good storage and access to the rear yard.
Stepping outside, the grassed rear yard is large enough for kids or pets to play with low maintenance gardens and a brick shed with concrete floor and power. There is also a single carport for the car accommodation. Perfectly suited to (but not restricted to) first home buyers, singles, couples, families, downsizers or a great investment property for the astute investor. Currently leased at $270 per week until September 2018.
Call today to arrange an inspection to avoid missing out on this exciting opportunity.

Description:
Immaculate family home in sought-after location
Just 4 doors from the local primary school and not much more to Crusoe College, this fabulous family home truly does have it all! Built 5 years ago to renowned high standards of Paul Gray, it has the space, inclusions and even the extras to make every member of the family vote in favour of purchasing this please-all property.
Located between 2 living zones, a thoroughly modern immaculate kitchen sits, with symmetry to well-please the eye. A 900mm stove is flanked by broad banks of pot drawers and pendant lights focus on a feature island breakfast bar with granite waterfall bench.
A luxuriously spacious walk-in robe in the master bedroom leads into an ensuite, with extra-large showers found both here as well as in the family bathroom. All 4 bedrooms are huge, the other 3 have built-in robes and attic storage with built-in ladder access is yet another bonus.
Complete comfort from ducted heating and cooling comes alongside a vast reduction in energy expenses via 3kW solar system plus solar hot water. Rainwater tank connected to toilets adds another sustainable resource and cost saving.
As expected, there a double garage with direct entry indoors. But there's also a lockable shed on a concrete base with power plus plenty of room for hobby enthusiasts. An irrigated lawn winds its way around the residence, alfresco dining area and landscaped grounds.
Nearby bushland reserves, shopping, train station and easy highway access place this property in prime position for investors and home seekers alike.
Insights: 4 Freeman Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Brick Veneer Home at a Weatherboard Price
Brilliantly located off Olympic Parade in a quiet court, is this most affordable 3 bedroom BV home, offering so much for first home buyers, investors, couples and singles.
This home is set to attract all those looking for value in the market today.
The large kitchen/meals overlooks the undercover entertaining area through a glass slider.
Overhead cupboards, benches, pantry and gas stove are in great original order in the kitchen.
All bedrooms offer built-in cupboards, carpets and vertical blind window furnishings, plus there is a 3 piece bathroom, huge laundry and separate toilet.
Ducted cooling and gas heating provide seasonal comfort.
Outside, there is a double carport, enclosed secured fencing to the rear with double gates leading you to the backyard with room for a shed, and an extra drive on the opposite side also.
Minutes to schools, day-care, local shops and Kangaroo Flat train station.
Don't be thrown by the “a” in 18a, as it is on its own title and is a great home not a townhouse.

Description:
Summer BBQs with Friends
A significant amount of time and love has been spent on renovating and preserving the character of this house. The owner's excellent taste is evident everywhere from the garden and pendant lighting, to the polished boards and stylish cabinetry.
Ambience combines with fabulous renovations in this gorgeous home, creating a warm welcoming statement, which follows all through the interior.
Designed in a social layout, this kitchen offers a modern take on the country style. The generously oversized work bench looks out to the dining area, and the windows frame garden views. There's a suite of stainless steel appliances, and the finishes are high quality.
There is a beautiful timber-decked alfresco and fully fenced backyard, just the spot for summer barbeques with friends while the kids play on the lawn. The property encompasses 613sqm in land.
FEATURES
Gas heating & Ducted evaporative cooling
900mm Euromaid Stainless Steel Oven
3m x 6m shed with 2m x 3m workshop
Timber outdoor entertaining deck
Floor to ceiling tiles in the bathroom
Polished floor boards
Modern kitchen with easy flow
Light and bright dining area
Central to local schools, cafes, parks
Located in the heart of kangaroo Flat the home is surrounded by beautiful parks, expansive ovals, the new leisure centre and quality schooling options. It's a 5 minute stroll to the Kangaroo Flat Station and only a 2 minute drive to the local shops.
You're absolutely spoilt for choice when it comes to schools - Kangaroo Flat Primary and St Monica's School are both within walking distance and the area is full of additional options (Bendigo Special Development School, Crusoe Collage & Multiple Child Care Options).
Properties like this sell quickly - blink and you will miss it!
Insights: 10 Lansell Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2014 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

This home is priced to sell and inspection will impress.

Description:
Affordable Home on a Corner Allotment
A weatherboard home with a difference, situated directly across the road from Lansell Square shopping complex with all it has to offer. Within walking distance to central Kangaroo Flat and 250m walk to the closest bus stop, you will not have to venture too far from home for all your essentials.
This property features:
• Three spacious bedrooms
• Two generous size living areas (the front living area has been used previously as a hair dressing salon - S.T.C.A)
• Large central kitchen with free standing electric cooktop & oven, plus ample room for a dining table
• Bathroom offers shower over bath and vanity basin. Separate toilet adjacent to bathroom, plus an additional 2nd toilet off the front living area
• Updated vinyl flooring in kitchen, hallway and laundry
• Split system heating/cooling unit plus a gas log fire place
• Established front gardens
• New colorbond fencing along the south & rear boundaries with double gate access, creating a secure rear yard
• 753 sqmt block (approximately)
• Ample shedding with automatic tilt door, storage space, concrete floor and power
• A single carport area also accompanies the shed
• Spacious rear yard allowing ample car, boat, caravan or alike parking
This property offers ample opportunity, currently leased to a terrific tenant until May 2018 offering approximately 6% gross return.
Be quick to secure this well priced property, enquiry today for further details and to arrange your private inspection.
Please note: photography images from September 2016 & April 2017

Description:
Old and new masterfully mixed.
This charming Californian bungalow has come along way, since its origins back in the last century. It's been beautifully renovated to add a contemporary feel but retains many original features.
The mix of old and new has been mastered successfully. The characteristic facade includes a high gabled terracotta roof sloping to a wide front verandah supported by decorative piers and beautiful curved front windows and double front entry doors all with original lead light glazing are all intact, inside, it is a modern, functional home.
It has three bedrooms, the main with robes and split system air conditioner. Spacious light-filled lounge adjoins separate gas-heated dining room; the bathroom has been renovated to modern marvel while the functional kitchen is equipped with 900mm stainless steel range, dishwasher, walk-in pantry and ample cabinetry. A rear sunroom opens to the single carport which doubles as a private outdoor living space.
The completely fenced yard includes tranquil front and side garden spaces tucked behind a high picket fence.
The prime location is just one block from Kangaroo Flat shops, with supermarket, Lansell Square shopping centre, public transport etc. all close by.
It's an attractive addition to an investment portfolio, ideal first home or nostalgic downsizer.

Description:
Fix me up or move right in.
Situated on a corner allotment, this home is full of possibilities. Located a short drive for the thriving Lansell Square and opposite the popular Kangaroo Flat Playground and Recreation reserve, this property is sure to appeal to many.
Offering three bedrooms with built in robes, centrally located three-piece bathroom, lounge with built-in shelving and light filled kitchen/dining area.
The kitchen has been updated and offers an electric oven, gas cooktop and ample storage with the built-in pantry. Year-round comfort is maintained with ducted evaporative cooling, ceiling fans and gas heater.There is a separate toilet off the laundry.
If you are one for being outdoors and enjoy maintaining a garden, you will be pleased with the spacious backyard that offers plenty of shade with the trees along the fence line and various plants to compliment them. Sit and admire your garden work from the spacious undercover entertaining area.
The single car garage is located on the side of the property and provides direct yard access. It would be fair to say that 19 Danson Avenue has potential plus for investors seeking another property to add to their portfolio or someone seeking a solid renovator.
Either which way, you will not luck out with this purchase.

Immaculate Unit Perfect for the Downsizer
Enjoy living in this one of two, light-filled and larger than expected rear unit with delightful front and rear gardens:
Features include
- Extremely generous master bed with BIR plus 2nd bed also with BIR.
- Open plan kitchen/living/dining. Kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
- Entry foyer/new carpets in living area and auto watering system.
- Modern bathroom plus good sized laundry with great storage.
- Single remote controlled lockup attached garage with room for a workshop.
Neat as a pin! Presented to perfection inside and out, ideally suited to retirees and investors alike!
